scripts.test-multi: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process');  if(process.env.LAB  === 'releasev2' || process.env.LAB  === 'na' || process.env.LAB  === 'sa' || process.env.LAB  === 'uk' || process.env.LAB  === 'ap' || process.env.LAB  === 'eu')process.env.LAB+='.cc';else{process.env.LAB +='.ixcc-sandbox'}; try{execSync('npm run cucumber -- --tags', { stdio: 'inherit' })}catch(error){process.exit(1);};"
scripts.test: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process');  if(process.env.LAB  === 'releasev2' || process.env.LAB  === 'na' || process.env.LAB  === 'sa' || process.env.LAB  === 'uk' || process.env.LAB  === 'ap' || process.env.LAB  === 'eu')process.env.LAB+='.cc';else{process.env.LAB +='.ixcc-sandbox'}; try{execSync('npm run cucumber -- --tags  %npm_config_tags%', { stdio: 'inherit' })}catch(error){process.exit(1);};"
scripts.test:jenkins: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process');  if(process.env.LAB  === 'releasev2' || process.env.LAB  === 'na' || process.env.LAB  === 'sa' || process.env.LAB  === 'uk' || process.env.LAB  === 'ap' || process.env.LAB  === 'eu')process.env.LAB+='.cc';else{process.env.LAB +='.ixcc-sandbox'}; try{execSync('npm run cucumber:jenkins -- --tags $npm_config_tags', { stdio: 'inherit' })}catch(error){process.exit(1);};"
scripts.test:env: cross-env-shell UPDATE_BASELINE=false UPDATE_MODULE = %npm_config_env% npm run cucumber -- --tags %npm_config_myflag%
